newsitem.title: JAPAN: MOF says plans to hold T-bill auction on Monday.
newsitem.headline: MOF says plans to hold T-bill auction on Monday.

text.p: Japan"s Ministry of Finance (MOF) is planning to offer Treasury Bills (T-bills) through a price competitive auction on Monday, a MOF official said on Friday.

The T-bills to be offered at auction are expected to have three-month maturities, while the size of the offer is seen at about 1.5 trillion yen, as 1.5 trillion yen worth of three-month T-bills is due to mature on February 20, traders said.
